name: The Forgetful Alchemist
description:
A goofy alchemist loses his reading glasses and tries to find them in the most inefficient way.

The Forgetful Alchemist is an action escape room in which you have to find your glasses while dealing with magical creatures.

This game was created in 48 hours during the 2021 Global Game Jam by;

Enrico Dutto - Game Design, Programming

Federico Giorsetti - Game Design

Alessandro Cossidente - Narrative Design

Emilia Gozzano - Art, Concept

The game assets were made with Tiltbrush
